title: WTB T206 Mullin, batting, blank back

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Mullin, batting, blank back
posts.post_content:
Missed a T206 George Mullin, batting, Detroit with Blank Back in the recent Memory Lane auction.  If the winner wants to resell I would be very interested. Thank you,
Art M.

[url]http://www.memorylaneinc.com/site/bidplace.aspx?id=2ceac793-b7ac-4c76-be46-60ed6b0a7211[/url]

Those blank backs were beauties , huh!?

sorry you missed mullin:mad:

I will keep an eye out for it for ya:)
